creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: mirror, two part, rectangular, carved and gilded, with architectural frame; frame fluted columns of Empire design at sides; upper section of mirror displays, on a white ground, a garland of flowers, and conventionalized leaves, suspended from two ribboned bows, the whole in gold picked out with black; glass original, in poor condition
title: Mirror
